name: Logging Harvester Truck
description:
Become a forestry worker! Harvest trees and put them in the logging trucks. Be fast, other workers are waiting for timber. Complete easy tutorial with old worker - he knows what and how to harvest. Then, do missions. They can be challenging, especially with time limit. Use a timber crane to load and unload logs on logging truck. Drive truck and have fun!

Features of Logging Harvester Truck:
- Big forest
- Easy tutorial
- Challenging harvest missions
- Real logging vehicles
- 3D graphics and real sounds

Do you like logging games and timber truck driving? It is a great forest harvest simulator for real men! It is time to drive in Forest Harvester Simulator. Get ready for challenging harvest missions. Even if you can't drive in real life, you can drive a forest harvester in the simulator. Explore forest and enjoy the timber harvest atmosphere.

Today is the best day to drive a timber vehicle with our harvest simulator. Complete logging missions. Then - load timber truck with cargo. Then drive to the next point and harvest there. Complete missions in the simulator and enjoy the work. Cut timber and earn money.

We made this vehicle simulator for you, forest workers! Harvest all timber we prepared in the simulator. Be careful. Forestry is not easy, but you can drive the best timber trucks! We have prepared a lot of work for your trucks in our vehicle simulator. Challenge your friends: who is the best logging truck driver? Who can cut timber better in simulator?

Test the power of big vehicle with Logging Harvester Truck!
